title: Slate's Spoiler Specials: Snakes on a Plane
description:
Slate's Dana Stevens and Bryan Curtis discuss Snakes on a Plane, starring Samuel L. Jackson. WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie.
